Item.method_code:
' name: deleteProjectTree ' purpose: APQP. Delete project tree. ' created: 8-JUL-2005 Yuri Delyamba ' (c) Copyright by Aras Corporation, 2005-2007. Dim thisType As String = Me.GetType() 'Project or Project Template supposed Dim projectId As String = Me.getID() Dim wbsID As String = Me.getProperty("wbs_id")
Dim conn As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDatabase = CCO.Variables.InnDatabase
If String.IsNullOrEmpty(wbsID) Then Dim itm As Item = Me.newItem(thisType, "get") itm.setAttribute("select", "wbs_id") itm.setID(projectId) itm = itm.apply() If itm.isError() Then Return itm
wbsID = itm.getProperty("wbs_id") End If
Me.setProperty("wbs_id", wbsID) 'inDom.LoadXml(String.Format("<Item type='{0}' id='{1}' doGetItem='0'><wbs_id>{2}</wbs_id></Item>", thisType, projectId, wbsID))
'If IsNothing(wbsID) Or wbsID = "" Then ' CCO.XML.SetErrorMessage(outDom, 3, "Can not remove root element:'" & wbsID & "' from project:'" & projectId & "'", _ ' "deleteProjectTree:MethodMainSubroutine:" & CCO.XML.GetFaultDetails(outDom) & " - " & CCO.XML.GetFaultString(outDom)) ' Exit Function 'End If
Return Me
Item.name: deleteProjectTree
